odase

Class KnowledgeBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • odase.KnowledgeBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HedwigModel, Model, ModelReadOnly, ModelUpdate, SwrlModel, ValidatableModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompareTwoKnowledgeBase, ConcurrentKnowledgeBase

    public class KnowledgeBase
extends Object
implements Model
    Default ODASE implementation of the Model interface and provides access to a TBoxModel. This knowledge base is threadsafe and can be used concurrently, however for better concurrent performance we suggest using ConcurrentKnowledgeBase.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KnowledgeBase

        public KnowledgeBase(KnowledgeBase kb)
        Create a copy of the given knowledge base. The new knowledge base and the existing one share some resources (such as database stores) but have their own copies of other resrouces (such as trie stores). Copying a KB with both a database and memory store will lead to inconsistencies. The memo table of the new store is initially the same as the existing store but the tables will begin to diverge, which is safe.

      • KnowledgeBase

        public KnowledgeBase(String MaybeCatalog,
                     String reasonerId,
                     List<String> storeIds,
                     String updateableStoreId,
                     KnowledgeBaseOptions options)
        Constructs the knowledge base with the given store ids. All the stores containing axioms must be passed here.
        Parameters:
        MaybeCatalog - the path to the catalog xml file (can be null)
        reasonerId - the uri of the reasoner (cannot be null, but if you don't know what to put, just put any valid uri)
        storeIds - the list of store uris
        updateableStoreId - the store in which the updates will be pushed (must be one from storeIds)
        options - contains the configuration of dolores, to tune the performance/completeness compromise and the tbox options

      • KnowledgeBase

        public KnowledgeBase(String MaybeCatalog,
                     String reasonerId,
                     List<String> storeIds,
                     String updateableStoreId,
                     List<jmercury.kb_uri_spec.Rdf_data_store_getter_0> customStoreGetters,
                     KnowledgeBaseOptions options)
        Constructs the knowledge base with the given store ids. All the stores containing axioms must be passed here.
        Parameters:
        MaybeCatalog - the path to the catalog xml file (can be null)
        reasonerId - the uri of the reasoner (cannot be null, but if you don't know what to put, just put any valid uri)
        storeIds - the list of store uris
        updateableStoreId - the store in which the updates will be pushed (must be one from storeIds)
        customStoreGetters - the custom store getters, see odase.RdfDataStoreGetter
        options - contains the configuration of dolores, to tune the performance/completeness compromise and the tbox options

      • KnowledgeBase

        public KnowledgeBase(String MaybeCatalog,
                     String reasonerId,
                     List<String> storeIds,
                     String updateableStoreId,
                     List<jmercury.kb_uri_spec.Rdf_data_store_getter_0> customStoreGetters,
                     List<SwrlBuiltinStructure> customBuiltins,
                     KnowledgeBaseOptions options)
        Constructs the knowledge base with the given store ids. All the stores containing axioms must be passed here.
        Parameters:
        MaybeCatalog - the path to the catalog xml file (can be null)
        reasonerId - the uri of the reasoner (cannot be null, but if you don't know what to put, just put any valid uri)
        storeIds - the list of store uris
        updateableStoreId - the store in which the updates will be pushed (must be one from storeIds)
        customStoreGetters - the custom store getters, see odase.RdfDataStoreGetter
        customBuiltins - the custom builtins defining the builtins and their evaluation
        options - contains the configuration of dolores, to tune the performance/completeness compromise and the tbox options

      • forkKnowledgeBase

        public KnowledgeBase forkKnowledgeBase()
        Fork a child from this knowledge base. The child KB can be used in a concurrent query and later joined with it's parent. This function is intended for use by ODASE, but may be used by others to create different abstractions.
        Returns:
        the child KB
        See Also:
        joinKnowledgeBase

      • getRdfDataStore

        public RdfDataStore getRdfDataStore(String storeId)
        Modifying the returned store will not affect the KnowledgeBase, To update the KnowledgeBase with a modified store, use setRdfDataStore.
        Parameters:
        storeId -
        Returns:
        an RdfDataStore for the store id, or null if there are no store associated to the store id.

      • getTBoxModel

        public TBoxModel getTBoxModel()
        Construct a TBox model (reasoner) from the knowledge base. A TBox model is used to query the model in terms of concepts and properties.
        Returns:
        the TBoxModel constructed from all the axioms found in the stores (only axioms from the initial stores, updates and overrides are not taken into account)

      • getUpdateableStoreId

        public String getUpdateableStoreId()
        Get the store uri (id) which is currently set as updateable, meaning that all updates will be applied to that store.
        Returns:
        the string containing the URI of the store set as updateable

      • joinKnowledgeBase

        public void joinKnowledgeBase(KnowledgeBase child)
        Join a child knowledge base back to its parent. After forking a child kb, that kb should be joined with it's parent. This function is intended for use by ODASE, but may be used by others to create different abstractions.
        Parameters:
        child - is the child knowledge base.
        See Also:
        forkKnowledgeBase

      • optimize

        public void optimize()

      • overrideDataStoreFromStream

        @Deprecated
public KnowledgeBase overrideDataStoreFromStream(String storeIdToOverride,
                                                              String mimeType,
                                                              InputStream stream)
        Deprecated. 
        Add a data store from the stream to parse in the syntax given by the mimeType. Warning, if the store contains tbox-axioms, they will not be taken into account as tbox (meaning any rules, concepts, properties will not be used in the reasoning).
        Parameters:
        storeIdToOverride - the uri of the existing store to override with the rdf contained in the stream
        mimeType - can be application/rdf+xml for owl/rdf as xml, text/turtle for tutle (ttl), text/plain for ntriples (nt)
        stream - the stream containing rdf in the form of either rdf/xml, turtle or ntriples
        Returns:
        the new knowledge base, with the store overridden (this method does not modify the existing knowledge base)

      • overrideDataStoreWithEmptyMemoryStore

        @Deprecated
public KnowledgeBase overrideDataStoreWithEmptyMemoryStore(String storeIdToOverride)
        Deprecated. 
        Create a new knowledge base with the store identified by storeIdToOverride reset to an empty memory rdf store
        Parameters:
        storeIdToOverride - the store to override with an empty memory triple store
        Returns:
        the new knowledge base, with the store overridden (this method does not modify the existing knowledge base)

      • overrideDataStoreWithStoreFromKnowledgeBase

        @Deprecated
public KnowledgeBase overrideDataStoreWithStoreFromKnowledgeBase(String storeIdToOverride,
                                                                              KnowledgeBase other)
        Deprecated. 
        Create a new KnowledgeBase from this one. This call overrides the given store by the one found in other. This allows to transfer a triple store from one knowledge base to another
        Parameters:
        storeIdToOverride - the store to override with the corresponding store from other knowledge base
        other - the other knowledge base from which to transfer (copy or share depending on the store type) the store
        Returns:
        the new knowledge base, with the store overridden (this method does not modify the existing knowledge base)

      • removeRdfDataStore

        public KnowledgeBase removeRdfDataStore(String storeId)
        Create a new KnowledgeBase after removing the store for the store id. Warning, if the store contained tbox-axioms, they will not be taken taken out (meaning any rules, concepts, properties will continue to be used in the reasoning).
        Parameters:
        storeId -
        Returns:
        the updated KnowledgeBase

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • setStats

        public void setStats(QueryStats queryStats)
        Set the query statistics structure. This can be useful to share the same structure between multiple KBs. By default every knowledge base creates it's own QueryStats object, so it is not necessary to call this.

      • setUpdateableStoreId

        public void setUpdateableStoreId(String updateableStoreId)
        Set the store uri (id) which is currently set as updateable, meaning that all updates will be applied to that store.
        Parameters:
        updateableStoreId - the new store uri in which updates will be applied to
